name: Laravel 5.1 ACL
body:
### Welcome to Laravel 5.1 Access Control List (ACL).
> Hello! I'm Dong Quoc Vuong - Laravel developer

***
This is mini project  for test permission & Role function in Laravel 5.1.
Origin about Role & permission you can see here: https://github.com/romanbican/roles
Only for relax but this version includes the following functions:
+ Login & logout Laravel 5.1
+ Roles & permission: thank romanbican/role (github)
+ Base Articles& Categories (Unfinished)
+ ....
***    

Very Basic but i think this project help you use for base develop many big project in future!     
  

Instruction:         

***    


https://youtu.be/4kyxKs9WbII    

SQL Diagram  

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vuongdq/acl-laravel/master/Screen%20Shot%202015-09-16%20at%2012.13.19%20AM.png)
